{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=G-1000 |revision= |upc=760559114527 |ean= |asin=B0000VCWSM |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/20/2003 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=O6M-WM601I,M4Y-XG-600 |ic_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Samsung |cpu1_model=S3C2510A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160ABTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W986432EH-7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XG-600 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Wireless |default_ssid_regex=^Wireless$ |default_ip=192.168.1.2 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:A0:C5 |oui_eth=00:A0:C5 |default_ch= }} The FCC ID printed on the unit (O6M-WM601I) is not valid. The wireless module is a Z-Com XG-601.
The CPU is part S3C2510A01.
The default SSID is '''Wireless'''.
